body:
re:
>> I didn't want to get rid of THTensor_getStoragePtr because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an at::Storage instead, and that's a lot safer.

that was what I was trying to get across -- just do whatever you need to do and we'll resolve it when we have one Storage/StorageImpl.
body_html:
re:

I didn't want to get rid of THTensor_getStoragePtr because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an at::Storage instead, and that's a lot safer.

that was what I was trying to get across -- just do whatever you need to do and we'll resolve it when we have one Storage/StorageImpl.
body_text:
re:


I didn't want to get rid of THTensor_getStoragePtr because I don't want to return raw storage pointer in the "official" API, because after @cpuhrsch's patch merges I can return an at::Storage instead, and that's a lot safer.


that was what I was trying to get across -- just do whatever you need to do and we'll resolve it when we have one Storage/StorageImpl.
